name: writePNGRepresentation(of:to:format:colorSpace:options:)
desc: Renders the image and exports the resulting image data as a file in PNG format.
declaration:
func writePNGRepresentation(of image: CIImage, 
                         to url: URL, 
                     format: CIFormat, 
                 colorSpace: CGColorSpace, 
                    options: [CIImageRepresentationOption : Any] = [:]) throws
